name: ContinuousLinearMap.det_pi
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
M : Type u_3
inst✝⁶ : Fintype ι
inst✝⁵ : CommRing R
inst✝⁴ : AddCommGroup M
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝² : Module R M
inst✝¹ : Module.Free R M
inst✝ : Module.Finite R M
f : ι → ContinuousLinearMap (RingHom.id R) M M
⊢ Eq (ContinuousLinearMap.pi fun i => (f i).comp (ContinuousLinearMap.proj i)).det (Finset.univ.prod fun i => (f i).det)
decl:
theorem det_pi {ι R M : Type*} [Fintype ι] [CommRing R] [AddCommGroup M]
    [TopologicalSpace M] [Module R M] [Module.Free R M] [Module.Finite R M]
    (f : ι → M →L[R] M) :
    (pi (fun i ↦ (f i).comp (proj i))).det = ∏ i, (f i).det :=
  LinearMap.det_pi _

name: ContinuousLinearEquiv.det_coe_symm
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝³ : Field R
M : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝¹ : AddCommGroup M
inst✝ : Module R M
A : ContinuousLinearEquiv (RingHom.id R) M M
⊢ Eq (↑A.symm).det (Inv.inv (↑A).det)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem det_coe_symm {R : Type*} [Field R] {M : Type*} [TopologicalSpace M] [AddCommGroup M]
    [Module R M] (A : M ≃L[R] M) : (A.symm : M →L[R] M).det = (A : M →L[R] M).det⁻¹ :=
  LinearEquiv.det_coe_symm A.toLinearEquiv
